alert.note: Alert for Clark; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 3:19PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Clark and south central Hot Spring Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 318 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Halfway, or 14 miles west of Arkadelphia, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arkadelphia... Caddo Valley... Okolona... Halfway... DeGray Lake State Park... Gum Springs in Clark County... Donaldson... Friendship... Hollywood... Lower Lake Recreation Area... De Roche... Midway in Hot Spring County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
